definition[0]: the parts of plants that you eat but cannot digest. Fibre helps to keep you healthy by moving food quickly through your body
example[0]: Fruit and vegetables are high in fibre content.
example[1]: food that is high in dietary fibre
definition[1]: a mass of threads used to make rope, cloth etc
definition[2]: a thin thread, or one of the thin parts like threads that form natural materials such as wood or carbon
